nodes.text: Destruction of an abandoned weapons depot

The destruction of an abandoned weapons depot was undertaken in 5 ABY by General Lando Calrissian and Shriv Suurgav on the planet Sullust. Although the original intent of the mission was to recover the weapons in the depot for the New Republic before the Galactic Empire could, however, when it was found that the Empire had secretly restarted the weapons factory, Calrissian felt it was better to destroy the depot to prevent the Empire from producing more weapons.
